Name: Landmarks, Seaside Park & Community Arts Center Special Permit, Brooklyn (C 260012 PPK).
Title: Application number C 260012 PPK (Seaside Park & Community Arts Center Special Permit) submitted by the NYC Department of Citywide Administrative Services and the New York City Economic Development Corporation, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the disposition of one city-owned property located on Block 7071, Lot 130 and p/o Lot 123, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 13, Council District 47.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
